aws_queue_name_or_arn.title: Queue Name
aws_queue_name_or_arn.description: The SQS Queue Name or ARN

oneOf.title: Access Key
oneOf.description: The access key obtained from AWS
An opaque reference to the aws_access_key

oneOf.title: Secret Key
oneOf.description: The secret key obtained from AWS
An opaque reference to the aws_secret_key

aws_region.title: AWS Region
aws_region.description: The AWS region to connect to

aws_auto_create_queue.title: Autocreate Queue
aws_auto_create_queue.description: Setting the autocreation of the SQS queue.

aws_amazon_a_w_s_host.title: AWS Host
aws_amazon_a_w_s_host.description: The hostname of the Amazon AWS cloud.

aws_protocol.title: Protocol
aws_protocol.description: The underlying protocol used to communicate with SQS

aws_queue_u_r_l.title: Queue URL
aws_queue_u_r_l.description: The full SQS Queue URL (required if using KEDA)

aws_uri_endpoint_override.title: Overwrite Endpoint URI
aws_uri_endpoint_override.description: Set the overriding endpoint URI. This option needs to be used in combination with overrideEndpoint option.

aws_override_endpoint.title: Endpoint Overwrite
aws_override_endpoint.description: Set the need for overiding the endpoint URI. This option needs to be used in combination with uriEndpointOverride setting.

aws_delay.title: Delay
aws_delay.description: Milliseconds before the next poll of the selected stream
